other_tests.findings: Continuous glucose monitoring showed normoglycemia over 72 hours after discontinuation of pump therapy.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Treatment with ursodeoxycholic acid was started with some improvement on subsequent US studies.

other_tests.date: During first 2 years of somatuline treatment
other_tests.findings: A mild, transient growth deceleration was observed, with a shift of height from the 50th to the 35th percentile.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subsequent catch-up growth occurred, and the patient resumed normal growth along the 50th percentile.

other_tests.findings: Blood glucose was stabilized after treatment with octreotide via insulin pump.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No change in growth pattern or cholelithiasis was observed after switching to lanreotide.
